p: Several cases of low pathogenic avian influenza H6 were identified in laying and turkey farms throughout the Netherlands between 2018 and 2019 [ 55]. Most cases were detected via monitoring (serologically positive) and a single case identified based on clinical symptoms. The circulating viruses appeared to be largely benign in poultry. The frequency of identification raises the question of whether specific strains of H6Nx may be becoming more adapted to poultry.
